thread.title: BRIEF-United Technologies Says Disagrees With Several Of Assertions In Third Point Letter

title: BRIEF-United Technologies Says Disagrees With Several Of Assertions In Third Point Letter
text:
Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-United Technologies Says Disagrees With Several Of Assertions In Third Point Letter Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
May 4 (Reuters) - United Technologies Corp:
* UNITED TECHNOLOGIES CORP SAYS IS IN RECEIPT OF A CORRESPONDENCE FROM THIRD POINT IN WHICH IT EXPRESSES ITS VIEWS ON THE COMPANYâ€™S PORTFOLIO STRUCTURE
* UNITED TECHNOLOGIES SAYS DISAGREES WITH SEVERAL OF ASSERTIONS CONTAINED IN THIRD POINT LETTER
* UNITED TECHNOLOGIES CORP SAYS EXPECT A FULL REVIEW OF THE UTC PORTFOLIO TO BE COMPLETED IN 2018 Source text: ( unitedtech.co/2rmuEYX ) Further company coverage:
